title: Great wonders of the world; a Doug Jones travelogue
brief_description: Narrated and filmed by Doug Jones, this video takes us on a whirlwind journey around the world to see the great sights. The Pyramids, Colosseum, Big Ben and the Eiffel Tower feature as man-made wonders, while the Grand Canyon and Ayers Rock are part of the natural splendour of our planet. This video offers a taste of what the world has to offer but this is more than enough to tantalise the armchair traveller.
